value:
$WmMPID_愛の祭リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Valentine18,Face|Uncle Eliwood, the enemy is almost
here.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|So I see... It's a shame this all had to
happen in the middle of the festival.$k$pAnd to make matters worse, the
cataclysm has divided our forces. At
this rate...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Valentine18,Face|Uncle...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|You must hide, Lilina. This place will
soon be a battlefield.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Valentine18,Face|But I want to fight, too!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|Out of the question. If something were
to happen to you, I could never face
Hector again.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Valentine18,Face|You're concerned about my father?
But...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|Roy should be close by. We'll be fine
once we can join up.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Valentine18,Face|Father! Lilina! I'm so glad you're safe.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Valentine18,Face|Roy!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Valentine18,Face|Father, Lord Hector is battling on the
frontline.$k$pAccording to his new ally, our enemy
is from another world... And this
phenomenon is called the Tempest.$k$pI'm heading back into battle right
away. Please, stay here and—$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|No. I'm coming with you.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Valentine18,Face|But, Father... Your health...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|My health is fine. I understand that in
your world, I'm ill... But right now, I'm
at full strength.$k$pNow let's go and provide Hector with
some assistance.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Valentine18,Face|Thank you, Father. It feels like some
sort of dream to be able to fight by
your side...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|Ha. Well, I'll do my best to leave you
with a good impression. Now let's go!$k$p

$WmMPID_愛の祭ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Valentine18,Face|The vortex is fading.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|You're right. We managed to quell it,
somehow.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Valentine18,Face|I'm glad... Father?$k$p...Thank you.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|It's I who should thank you.$k$pThe fractured worlds are repairing
themselves. We should say our
goodbyes while we can.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Valentine18,Face|Father...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Valentine18,Face|Roy... The way you fought shows that
you are truly worthy of leading the
Pherae armies.$k$pI am certain that you will be a child of
fire... One that saves the land from an
evil star.$k$pI'm proud to be your father. I hope we
meet again, my dear son.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Valentine18,Face|Thank you, Father...$k$p
